browse-shows: SELECT ShowDetail.ID, ShowName, TypeName, Duration FROM ShowDetail JOIN TypeOfShow ON TypeOfShow.ID = ShowDetail.TypeOfShowID
get-show-by-ID: select * FROM ShowDetail JOIN LiveMusic ON ShowDetail.LiveMusicID = LiveMusic.ID JOIN ShowLanguage ON ShowDetail.LanguageID = ShowLanguage.ID JOIN TypeOfShow ON ShowDetail.TypeOfShowID = TypeOfShow.ID WHERE ShowDetail.ID =
all-performances-for-single-show: SELECT Performance.ID, ShowName, ShowDateTime, PriceID FROM Performance JOIN ShowDetail ON Performance.ShowDetailID = ShowDetail.ID WHERE ShowDetailID = show-id-from-java
get-performance-by-ID: select Performance.ID, ShowDateTime, TypeOfShowID, ShowName, ShowDescription, Duration, PriceID, Performaner, LangugeName FROM Performance JOIN ShowDetail ON Performance.ShowDetailID = ShowDetail.ID JOIN LiveMusic ON ShowDetail.LiveMusicID = LiveMusic.ID JOIN ShowLanguage ON ShowDetail.LanguageID = ShowLanguage.ID WHERE Performance.ID = performance-id-from-java
check-seat-available: SELECT COUNT(SeatID) AS CountBookedSeats FROM Reservation WHERE PerformanceID = performance-id-from-java AND SeatID = seat-id-from-java And CancellationDateTime = 0
get-number-of-stalls-seats-available: SELECT 120 - COUNT(SeatID) AS AvailableSeats FROM Reservation WHERE PerformanceID = performance-id-from-java AND CancellationDateTime = 0 AND SeatID <= 120
get-number-of-circle-seats-available: SELECT 80 - COUNT(SeatID) AS AvailableSeats FROM Reservation WHERE PerformanceID = performance-id-from-java AND CancellationDateTime = 0 AND SeatID >= 121
get-seat-price: SELECT seat-area-from-javaperformance-time-from-java FROM Performance JOIN ShowDetail ON Performance.ShowDetailID = ShowDetail.ID JOIN PriceBand ON ShowDetail.PriceID = PriceBand.ID WHERE Performance.ID = performance-id-from-java
